name: Louis Riel for Dinner
summary:
收录于盖伊·马丁(Guy Maddin)导演的《我的温尼伯湖》的CC影碟中。1964年，盖伊·马丁在他的小学外面捡到了一张写着这个故事的纸，五十年后Drew Christie将其改编成动画短片，马丁作旁白。
In 1964, the Canadian auteur filmmaker Guy Maddin found a crumpled up story outside of his elementary school. He has kept it with him his entire life, never knowing who the author was. This film is this story brought to life. It tells the tale of a cruel father, a folk hero and a duck.
